text: I really really like this idea, kind of like another wish I had a while back... to be able to build custom field types...

I think it would be good if a section could have a "same height" - option. For example when 3 Cards next to each other are placed. Maybe one could be able to choose which columns should be all have the same height, in case a section has more columns than the ones that should have the same height

Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.
